vampirism.tip.coffin_sleeping: Different creatures possess varying amounts of blood. Experiment to find the most nourishing prey!
vampirism.tip.garlic_avoidance: Beware of vampire hunters! They're relentless in their pursuit of the undead.
vampirism.tip.hunter_warning: Rest only in coffins, for a vampire's slumber is sacred and specific.
vampirism.tip.prey_blood_values: A trusty parasol can shield you from the sun's deadly rays. Never leave home without it!
vampirism.tip.sun_protection: Garlic is a vampire's nemesis. Avoid it like the plague... or face the consequences!
